text: This is a list of seasons completed by the BYU Cougars men's basketball team since the team's formation in 1902. They have been conference regular season champions 30 times and conference tournament champions 3 times. They have also appeared in 28 NCAA basketball tournaments, reaching the Elite Eight 3 times. ==Sources== *http://www.byucougars.com/uploads/pdf/basketball_m/MediaGuides/2010-2011/6-History.pdf Byu
title: List of BYU Cougars men's basketball seasons
